tool.name: snippy
tool.command:
#if str( $reftype.ref_type_selector ) == "fasta" cp "$reftype.ref" "foo.fna" && #end if #if str( $reftype.ref_type_selector ) == "genbank" cp "$reftype.ref" "foo.gbk" && #end if snippy --outdir "out" --cpus "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" #if str( $reftype.ref_type_selector ) == "fasta" --ref "foo.fna" #end if #if str( $reftype.ref_type_selector ) == "genbank" --ref "foo.gbk" #end if $cleanup #if str( $advanced.is_advanced ) == "advanced" --mapqual $advanced.mapqual --mincov $advanced.mincov --minfrac $advanced.minfrac #if $advanced.rgid --rgid $advanced.rgid #end if #if $advanced.bwaopt --bwaopt "$advanced.bwaopt" #end if #end if #if str( $fastq_input.fastq_input_selector ) == "paired" --pe1 "$fastq_input.fastq_input1" --pe2 "$fastq_input.fastq_input2" #end if #if str( $fastq_input.fastq_input_selector ) == "paired_collection" --pe1 "$fastq_input.fastq_input1.forward" --pe2 "$fastq_input.fastq_input1.reverse" #end if #if str( $fastq_input.fastq_input_selector ) == "single" --se "$fastq_input.fastq_input1" #end if #if str( $fastq_input.fastq_input_selector ) == "paired_iv" --peil "$fastq_input.fastq_input1" #end if
&&
gunzip out/snps.depth.gz
&&
tar -czf out.tgz out

param.name: ref_type_selector
param.label: Reference type
param.help: File type of the reference file. (Fasta or Genbank)

param.name: ref
param.label: Reference Fasta
param.help: Fasta file to use as the reference

param.name: ref
param.label: Reference Genbank
param.help: Genbank file to use as the reference

param.name: fastq_input_selector
param.label: Single or Paired-end reads
param.help: Select between paired and single end data

param.name: fastq_input1
param.label: Select a paired collection
param.help: See help section for an explanation of dataset collections

param.name: cleanup
param.label: Cleanup the non-snp output files
param.help: Remove all non-SNP files: BAMs, indices etc

param.name: mincov
param.label: Minimum coverage
param.help: Minimum coverage to call a snp

param.name: rgid
param.label: Bam header @RG ID
param.help: Use this @RG ID: in the BAM header

param.name: bwaopt
param.label: Extra BWA MEM options
param.help: Extra BWA MEM options, eg. -x pacbio

tool.help:
Synopsis: snippy 3.1 - fast bacterial variant calling from NGS reads
Author: Torsten Seemann <torsten.seemann@gmail.com>
Options: --reference [X] Reference genome. Supports FASTA, GenBank (not GFF) (default '')
--mapqual [n.n] Minimum mapping quality to allow (default '60')
--mincov [N] Minimum coverage of variant site (default '10')
--minfrac [n.n] Minumum proportion for variant evidence (default '0.9')
--cleanup Remove all non-SNP files: BAMs, indices etc (default OFF)
--rgid [X] Use this @RG ID: in the BAM header (default '')
--bwaopt [X] Extra BWA MEM options, eg. -x pacbio (default '')
